articles.author: TN Sports Desk
articles.title: Virat Kohli's Old Tweet For Aiden Markram After SA Batter Hits Fastest 100 In ODI World Cup History Goes Viral - Times Now
articles.description: South African batter Aiden Markram was on fire on Saturday (October 7) during his team's first match of the ODI World Cup 2023. In a fixture that was played against Sri Lanka in Delhi, 29-year-old Markram scored a century in just 49 balls to help his side pos…
articles.content: SA Vs SL: Aiden Markram Smashes Fastest ODI World Cup Century, Breaks 12-Year Record Held By Kevin O' Brien
